title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Apr 2 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H3 - Apr 2 2022
description:
Disney vs. DeSantis: Disney president pledges to create 50% queer characters for your kids. Disney bans "Ladies and Gentleman, Boys and Girls" tagline at theme parks. Disney president cries about insufficient Disney stories focused on gay characters. Woke ideology is running corporate America. Disney exec claims DeSantis bill will take children away from parents.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
